class.name: bbr.esb.events.entities.DocumentTraceLastDays
class.sql-query:
WITH maxid AS (SELECT MAX(id) AS max, num_doc FROM public.document_trace_lastdays WHERE "timestamp" >= date_trunc('day', now()) AND service_cod = :servicename AND company_rut= :companyrut GROUP BY num_doc ), orderstatus AS (SELECT ld.num_doc, service_cod, site_cod, "timestamp" as time, CASE WHEN(document_tracetype_id in (4,8)) THEN 'Recibido' WHEN(document_tracetype_id in (5)) THEN 'Error' WHEN(document_tracetype_id in (6)) THEN 'Reenviando' ELSE 'En proceso' END AS statusname, document_tracetype_id AS statusid ,company_rut, s.retail_name FROM public.document_trace_lastdays ld INNER JOIN maxid m ON (m.max = ld.id ) INNER JOIN public.site s ON s.name=site_cod )
SELECT COUNT(1) as count, site_cod AS sitename, retail_name as retailname,statusname FROM orderstatus GROUP BY site_cod, statusname, retail_name ORDER BY site_cod
